## The Prior's Whisper

In Bayesian lore, we start with a hunch (*prior*) and let data refine it (*posterior*).\
Behold a simple coin-flip oracle using **rstanarm**.

```{r}
#knitr::opts_chunk$set(
#	echo = true,
#	message = TRUE,
#	warning = TRUE
#)
#install.packages("rstanarm")
library(rstanarm)

# Simulated flips: 7 heads in 10 tosses
data <- data.frame(y = c(rep(1,7), rep(0,3)))  # 1 = head

# Divination model
model <- stan_glm(y ~ 1, family = binomial(link = "logit"), data = data)

# Posterior summary
print(model)
posterior_interval(model, prob = 0.95)
```
